topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54aa20dd6368723236aa0100#post_54aa20dd6368723236aa0100

Not worth it though


"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54aa211f6368720a827d0000#post_54aa211f6368720a827d0000
[bq="Silent_Witness"]"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54aa20ac6368725c2ef50800#post_54aa20ac6368725c2ef50800
I may be mistaken, but as I recall, Black*Star was made as a caricature of Naruto (and other characters similar to him), so the annoyance factor is intentional... I think.[/bq]

That would explain a lot actually


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54aa21286368721e1dae0200#post_54aa21286368721e1dae0200
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54aa20ac6368725c2ef50800#post_54aa20ac6368725c2ef50800
But there's always a point to it and it's varied. With Kid it's always the same stupid symmetry gag. And that was dumb to begin with. Plus theres the fact that Black*Star ATE A FREAKING LASER BEAM! And then he SPAT IT BACK OUT![/bq]

Isn't it funny how that became pretty much the sole reason of his character even before the manga got to the mid-point?

Ask anyone who has seen Soul Eater what they remember from Kid, that's the only answer your bound to get.

Hooray Flanderization (Still don't like either, I find Black star annoying and like you said, Kid is stale. I'll stick to Medusa, she was a bitch but a wonderful bitch to hate)
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body: And then there's the fact that Black*Star worked his ass of for every one of his victories. He trained until his body broke and then he trained some more. All of Kid's accomplishments were because of his dad.
